description.value:
The stars move, granting you a sliver of their magic. Choose one of the following 1st-rank spells to your spell repertoire: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Object Reading] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sure Strike]. You can Cast this Spell as an occult Oatia skysage spell.

At 6th level, choose one of the following 2nd-rank spells to add to your spell repertoire: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Augury] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.See the Unseen]. At 8th level, you choose one of the following 3rd-rank spells to add to your spell repertoire: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Clairaudience] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Locate].
